channel.title: Comments on: A Crash Bandicoot test demo that I’ve produced in Dreams using the Crash 4 model. My first attempt at photo realism.

item.title: By: honeybearbandit
item.dc:creator: honeybearbandit
item.description: Great job! I love seeing all the insane stuff people can come up with in Dreams. It's really mind blowing that a dev made a game that allows for this level of creativity and depth. I can't do it myself, but it's cool seeing what everyone else does.
item.content:encoded: Great job! I love seeing all the insane stuff people can come up with in Dreams. It’s really mind blowing that a dev made a game that allows for this level of creativity and depth. I can’t do it myself, but it’s cool seeing what everyone else does.

item.title: By: tameimpalakid
item.dc:creator: tameimpalakid
item.description: Palm trees are beautiful! Love how they move in the wind
item.content:encoded: Palm trees are beautiful! Love how they move in the wind

item.title: By: GrimFlux
item.dc:creator: GrimFlux
item.description: It looks great, but unless the photo realism you mentioned is someone taking a photo at a hugely over saturated video game, you need a different term
item.content:encoded: It looks great, but unless the photo realism you mentioned is someone taking a photo at a hugely over saturated video game, you need a different term

item.title: By: Gamer_Fiend_DaD
item.dc:creator: Gamer_Fiend_DaD
item.description: Good job! I would greatly enjoy that level of beauty. I’d just kick back and just watch Crash’s idle animations. The nostalgia is overwhelming.
item.content:encoded: Good job! I would greatly enjoy that level of beauty. I’d just kick back and just watch Crash’s idle animations. The nostalgia is overwhelming.

item.title: By: TheLastOfME1
item.dc:creator: TheLastOfME1
item.description: That looks amazing, nice work and keep it going
item.content:encoded: That looks amazing, nice work and keep it going

item.title: By: htizzlemynizzle
item.dc:creator: htizzlemynizzle
item.description: Music is lit. Would be great to see a high school band ripping that
item.content:encoded: Music is lit. Would be great to see a high school band ripping that

item.title: By: MahamidMayhem
item.dc:creator: MahamidMayhem
item.description: Damn this looks really great. One personal change I would do would be to turn down the saturation a tad bit cuz those colors are quite bright, but maybe that's just me. Other than that, this is phenomenal.
item.content:encoded: Damn this looks really great. One personal change I would do would be to turn down the saturation a tad bit cuz those colors are quite bright, but maybe that’s just me. Other than that, this is phenomenal.
